chart_description: This chart shows the long-term average of the offset value in seconds. The offset is the difference between the system clock and the time provided by the NTP server. A negative offset means the system clock is behind the NTP server time, while a positive offset means the system clock is ahead of the NTP server time.

dimension_descriptions.offset: This dimension represents the difference between the system clock and the time provided by the NTP server in seconds. A negative value means the system clock is behind the NTP server time, while a positive value means the system clock is ahead of the NTP server time.
